title: Simple Steps to Cancel a Nutrisystem Subscription

steps.title: Dial 1-800-585-5483.
steps.content: Dial 1-800-585-5483 . Make sure to call Nutrisystem before 6:00 PM ET the day before your order's processing date. If you call any later than this, you will be charged for the order and you'll still receive it as usual. Have your Nutrisystem membership number handy before calling. You can find it on the billing papers that come with your delivered meals, the packaging slip in your deliveries, and in your account information online.

steps.title: Press 1 and then 4 on the menu.
steps.content: Press 1 and then 4 on the menu. When prompted, enter your membership number. Follow the prompts to cancel Nutrisystem. [1] X Research source If the automated system isn't helpful, call the number again, and select options 1 and then 6 to reach customer support.

steps.title: Cancel within 14 days of signing up, if possible.
steps.content: Cancel within 14 days of signing up, if possible. Since Nutrisystem has a 14-day money-back guarantee, you won't be charged a fee if you cancel within 14 days of subscribing to the meal delivery service. [2] X Research source When you first sign up, you get a big discount ($125) on your first delivery. However, you will have to pay it back if you cancel after 14 days. Canceling early ensures you won't be on the hook for that charge.

steps.title: Cancel before 6:00 PM ET the day before your order is processed.
steps.content: Cancel before 6:00 PM ET the day before your order is processed. You can see when your order is scheduled to be processed at https://www.nutrisystem.com/account . If the order is delivered and you refuse it or send it back, you'll have to pay a $19.99 return shipping charge.

steps.title: Can I cancel my Nutrisystem account online?
steps.content: Can I cancel my Nutrisystem account online? No. You must call 1-800-585-5483 if you want to cancel your subscription.

steps.title: How do I contact Nutrisystem customer service?
steps.content: How do I contact Nutrisystem customer service? If you don't want to call, you can chat with Nutrisystem by visiting https://www.nutrisystem.com/about/contact and clicking Chat . [3] X Research source You can also email them at customerservice@nutrisystem.com.

steps.title: Can I cancel Nutrisystem after one month?
steps.content: Can I cancel Nutrisystem after one month? Yes, you can cancel at any time, but if you cancel after one month, you'll be charged a cancellation fee of $125.

steps.title: Can I cancel Nutrisystem without a penalty?
steps.content: Can I cancel Nutrisystem without a penalty? If you call before 6:00 PM ET the day before your order is processed and you've had the subscription for less than 14 days, you won't be charged a penalty.
